front.title: •Dengar's Modified Riot Gun
front.gametext: Use 2 Force to deploy on Dengar, or 5 on your other bounty hunter. May target a non-droid character using 3 Force. Draw destiny. Character immediately captured if destiny +3 > defense value.
front.lore: Originally at area-effect weapon. Modified by Dengar to concentrate on one target. Induces an extended period of unconsciousness.
